DataElement.preferredName: Edmonton Symptom Assessment System Person Completing Form Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term that describes the individual completing the subjective symptom scale responses.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Edmonton Symptom Assessment System Current Assessment Person Completing Form
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-report assessment tool to screen for the intensity of nine symptoms commonly experienced by cancer patients in palliative care._Occurring in or belonging to the present time._Having determined the value, significance, or extent of._A human being._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._A printed or electronic document with spaces to be filled out.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Caregiver; the primary person in charge of care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.: The act of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort.

The act of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort.
